articles.description: Now, as over 70% of TCS staff are fully vaccinated and more than 95% have got at least one shot, India's biggest IT service provider Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), is also planning to return to the office in a big way, after almost 1.5 years of work from ho…
articles.content: It is no secret that return to the physical workplace is high on the agenda of major corporate entities. As the number of coronavirus cases are dipping and vaccination gaining pace, many IT companies… [+1007 chars]

articles.title: Tata Motors reports 24% increase in group global wholesales in Q2 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Global wholesales of all Tata Motors' commercial vehicles and Tata Daewoo range in Q2FY22 were at 89,055 units, up 57 per cent over Q2FY21.
articles.content:
Tata Motors on Monday reported a 24 per cent increase in group global wholesales, including that of Jaguar Land Rover (JLR), to 2,51,689 units in September quarter of FY22 over the year-ago period.

articles.title: AstraZeneca says its COVID-19 drug helps cut risk of severe disease or death in late-stage study - CGTN
articles.description: The drug, a cocktail of two antibodies called AZD7442, reduced the risk of severe COVID-19 or death by 50 percent in non-hospitalized patients who have had symptoms for seven days or less, meeting the main goal of the study.
articles.content: AstraZeneca's experimental COVID-19 drug has helped cut the risk of severe disease or death in a late-stage study, the British drugmaker said on Monday, a boost to its efforts to develop coronavirus … [+2672 chars]

articles.title: Sterling and Wilson Solar shares zoom 17% over Reliance deal - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Reliance has said it will acquire a 40 per cent stake in Sterling and Wilson Solar Ltd in a multi-stage transaction for about ₹2,845 crore.
